title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 31, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 31, 2020
description:
On today's Best Of episode of the Dan Patrick Show, Dan shares some information he received over the weekend about a possible return to football in the Big Ten. FOX Sports' Bruce Feldman, Dan Woike of the Los Angeles Times and Syracuse men's basketball head coach Jim Boeheim join the program. Plus, DP remembers the late, great former Georgetown head coach John Thompson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
